text: (aur) jab daood ke paas aa khade hue to vah unase dar gae un logon ne kaha ki aap daren nahin (ham donon) ek muqaddamen ke fareekain hain ki ham mein se ek ne doosare par jyaadatee kee hai to aap hamaare daramiyaan theek-theek phaisala kar deejie aur insaaph se ne guzariye aur hamen seedhee raah dikha deejie
